Services@Imagimation

Hal Miles Imagimation Studios can handle any size production from a 30 second commercial to a feature length film production; and from creating the initial story idea all the way through to the final post production.

We offer:
  • Feature Film Production
  • Television Series Production
  • Commercials
  • Shorts
  • Stop Motion Animation
  • Animatronics
  • Motion Control Miniature Cinematography
  • Traditional Animation
  • CG Animation
  • Visual Effects
  • Character Design
  • Amusement Park Attraction Fabrication
  • Motion Graphics
